name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vork: Smart Calendar Assistant for GCal

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Google Calendar extension to help you combat burnout

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vork integrates with Google Calendar and helps you:

✔️ Avoid meeting fatigue
✔️ Reduce unproductive meetings in half
✔️ Increase meeting engagement for you and your team.

Vork optimizes your schedule to help you get more work done without overworking yourself. 

We will help you say no to useless meetings, and schedule meetings at times when your attendees will be the most engaged.

It also helps you measure and track your daily burnout, schedule focus time, and more.

It’s a simple tool for a complex job - managing your time well. 

Get started by installing Vork then heading to Google Calendar (https://calendar.google.com/).
